Text:
Works like a charm.

In case you wonder what it can convert:

AVI. MPEG. WMV FLC iPOD iPHONE 3GP HD VIDEO HOMEDVD MP3 ripDVD YOUTUBE WEBVIDEO. 

Then there is an Device option with BlackBerry iphone, xbox 360, ps3, psp and many more handy devices :).

Thanks for the up.

-HCandmore
Everything works perfectly! Thanks for the UL!
